The photograph in question is not of Bet: Rourke, but rather a cropped version of a picture taken at a Gay Pride Parade in Athens, Greece in June 2016.
The photograph was originally shared on: Rourke, indicating that it was not originally associated with the American politician.
The image has previously been shared amo: wing circles, denigrating various groups such as "beta males," "liberal protesters," homosexuals, university students, and "snowflakes," but not specifically mentioning Beto O'Rourke.
The claim linking the photograph to Beto: Rourke only emerged in February 2019 when speculation arose about his potential candidacy for president, suggesting a baseless association.
